title: Nicola Sturgeon – 2022 Comments on the “Anti-Growth Coalition”
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nicola Sturgeon, the Scottish First Minister, on Twitter on 5 October 2022.
content:
Ranting about an imaginary ‘anti growth coalition’ is just an attempt to obscure the hard reality that the biggest brake on UK growth is Brexit – and that’s on the Tories.
